amendment.description: An amendment numbered 59 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to ensure that no funds may be used on new hires who have not been verified through the E-Verify program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. King (IA).
